headline: Sentiment down 162% this week, frustrations declining
key_insights: Fears trending up 209% over 7 days (strong momentum)
sentiment_commentary:
• Frustrations dominate with 152 quotes and 128 at strong intensity - people are expressing serious anger and dissatisfaction today.

• Despite the high volume, frustration scores dropped from yesterday's peak and remain well within the typical range for this period.

• Fears spiked dramatically from negative territory with 52 strong-intensity quotes, while optimism stayed deeply subdued.
methodology: See METHODOLOGY.md. Scores use z-score normalization with empirically-derived intensity weights from analytics_config.yaml. Alerts at |z| >= threshold (configurable, default 2.0 for p < 0.05).
